data.text: @SenatorLankford You know what?  If the Republican Party wants to make President Trump a lame duck for the second term of his Presidency, then he can just veto every single bill that comes to him and shut down the entire government. That’s what I’m going to be pushing if the Republican Party

@SenatorLankford This is Republicans Last Chance to have ANYTHING to run on in Nov-Passing SAVE is Worthless without ICE no restrictions AND Clearing Fraud from Voting Rolls all 50 sts-Especially GA-Remove Fraud Enforce Laws or Repubs betrayed Citizens in FundingBill,DOGE Cuts& our Voting Rights
@SenatorLankford They want ice to follow their actual policies and the constitution.

@SenatorLankford Jimmy, I don't care what else doesn't get funded! The Nazi gestapo death squads must be shut down! Each of them must have their mask removed & they all must be individually investigated! They've documented millions of Democrats to be swept up by the Gestapo! Just like Hitler did!

@SenatorLankford Do not budge an inch on the DHS appropriation. This is sick that we have literally let the democrats do this to us. They brought these people into our country and put out innocent American lives in danger. Because they unleashed all these illegal aliens on us, we have been

@SenatorLankford Senator, don't forget the SAVE Act.  I'll be watching your vote and support for it.  We must push it over the goal line.  Be part of that common-sense voting reform.  It's gotta happen or we're dead as a nation--if not tomorrow, very soon.
@SenatorLankford Getting ready to screw your constituents once again...
@SenatorLankford Oh no not a government shutdown! How would we fund all the programs fraught with fraud the republicans refuse to end?

@SenatorLankford Why don’t you make a video for the absolute necessity of passing the Save Act? I don’t really care if the government shuts down. All you do is steal from citizens to fund your corruption.
